titleStmt.title: The Kings Maiesties declaration to his subiects, concerning lawfull sports to be vsed
Proclamations. 1618-05-24
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, deputie printers for the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Greenwich the foure and twentieth day of May, in the sixteenth yeere of our raigne ..
Initial leaf contains large signature-mark "A" with ornament; last leaf contains a woodcut coat of arms.
Identified as STC 8566 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
